document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic revision of the subfamily Meloinae (Coleoptera: Meloidae) from Xizang, China, with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomic revision of the subfamily Meloinae (Coleoptera: Meloidae) from Xizang, China, with description of a new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Mylabris longiventris
Blair, 1927: 253
. Type locality: “ Tibet : Tingri, Shekkar, Kyishong, Chiblung, Tinki Dzong ( syntype )” ( Xizang , China ). Type depository: BMNH.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined from Xizang .
6 exs. , Tingri (elev.
4572 m
),
1924.VII.6
, Maj. R. W. G. Hingston leg. ( syntype ; BMNH )
;

, Yibin Ba & Aimin Shi leg. ( 2 exs. NXU , the remaining MHBU )
